Name: Project 1
Description: For our first project, my group and I developed an application from scratch that will display stock metrics pricing and daily news for a given company/ticker name. Our app will display all the given information that will help you make an informed decision on your investments with easy to use definitions in laymans terms that eliminates the confusing financial jargon.

Name: Project 2
Description: For my second project, our group developed an application that helps users post their questions for other bloggers to answer as well as allowing the user to practice sample interview questions and test their knowledge on known concepts.

Name: Weather Dashboard
Description: Application for displaying daily weather for any given city input by the user. As well as the five day future forecast.

Name: Eat Da Burger
Description: This is a restaurant application that lets users input the names of burgers they'd like to eat.

Name: Password Generator
Description: Given user input this application displays a random password that is generated given certain criteria.

Name: Day Planner
Description: This is an application where appointments are saved in local storage in a given 8 hour day and there are color coded time slots for past, present and future timings
